translation.MAINdescription:
Full-stack web developer, passionate about creating modern applications.
Always seeking new challenges and opportunities to improve my
code.
translation.ABOUTdescription:
Hey there! I'm Vinicius, a junior full-stack developer addicted to technology and passionate about solving digital puzzles. I hit the ground running on this journey, exploring the wonders of front-end development, and quickly found myself diving deeper into the world of programming.

Towards the end of 2022, I enrolled in a full-stack course that was a whirlwind of learning experiences. I acquired a plethora of new skills, from crafting user interfaces to managing servers.

I'm always eager to broaden my horizons, whether it's through delving into documentation or diving into projects that challenge me outside of my comfort zone.

What drives me on this journey? It's more than just writing code; it's about contributing to something greater. It's knowing that each line I write has the potential to impact someone's life, whether it simplifies daily tasks or fosters positive change.

I'm well aware that challenges lie ahead, but I'm prepared to tackle them head-on with confidence. Together, let's embark on this journey and reshape the landscape of the web!
translation.CONTACTdescription:
To get in touch, feel free to send an email to vinicius.cascaesp@gmail.com or fill out the form below.
Please provide the necessary information and leave your message in the dedicated text field.
I will do my best to respond as soon as possible.

projects.title: Focus Timer 2.0
projects.subtitle: Pomodoro App
projects.description: The Focus Timer 2.0 is a time management tool based on the Pomodoro technique, designed to help you stay focused and productive during your work sessions.

projects.title: FilmFanatic
projects.subtitle: Movie Rating
projects.description: FilmFanatic is an application that allows users to record and rate the movies they've watched, providing an organized way to keep track of and revisit their cinematic experiences.

projects.title: facilita.ai
projects.subtitle: AI for Transcription and Interaction
projects.description: facilita.ai is a platform that uses artificial intelligence to transcribe audio and video into text, enabling a wide range of text-based interactions with an integrated AI.

projects.title: Rocketpay
projects.subtitle: Payments Landing Page
projects.description: Rocketpay is a component that simulates the credit card form filling, where it's possible to add mask to inputs and update HTML elements via DOM.

projects.title: Rocketnotes
projects.subtitle: Notes App
projects.description: Rocketnotes is a note organization application, providing an efficient and accessible way for users to manage their personal and professional notes.

projects.title: Chirpify
projects.subtitle: Real-Time Chat
projects.description: Chirpify is a real-time chat platform that allows users to communicate instantly, promoting collaboration and connectivity in various situations.
